text: Purificacion Ortiz Ortiz (born June 6, 1972 in Madrid) is a track and field athlete from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind and a T11/F11/B1 type athlete. She competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in the F11-F12 long jump and finished third. == References == Category:Spanish long jumpers Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T11 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Purificacion Ortiz Ortiz
